10.1.name: Water Storage and Regulation
10.1.description: Stores and regulates water for use in the hydroelectric power plant

10.2.name: Water Intake
10.2.description: Controls the flow of water into the penstock

10.3.name: Water Conveyance
10.3.description: Carries water from the intake structure to the turbine

10.4.name: Water Discharge
10.4.description: Discharges water back into the river after passing through the turbine

20.1.name: Energy Conversion
20.1.description: Converts the kinetic energy of water into mechanical and electrical energy

30.1.name: Voltage Regulation
30.1.description: Increases or decreases the voltage of the generated electricity for long-distance transmission and distribution

30.2.name: Grid Connection
30.2.description: Connects the hydro power plant to the electrical grid

40.1.name: System Monitoring and Control
40.1.description: Monitors and controls various parameters of the power plant to maintain efficiency and safety

50.name: Auxiliary Systems
50.description: Support the main components of the hydroelectric power plant

50.1.name: Cooling
50.1.description: Provides cooling to the main components

50.2.name: Lubrication
50.2.description: Provides lubrication to the main components

50.3.name: Ventilation
50.3.description: Provides ventilation to the main components

50.4.name: Fire Protection
50.4.description: Provides fire protection to the main components

50.5.name: Emergency Power
50.5.description: Provides emergency power to the main components

50.6.name: Auxiliary Systems Management
50.6.description: Manages and controls the auxiliary systems to support the main components
